KIRJELDUS: The purpose of this course is to give students a basic knowledge of modern telecommunications technologiesObjectives/eesmärkid:  Develop knowledge in the field of Telecommunication technologiesLearning outcomes/õpiväljund:  Õppeaine läbinud õppija: Students prepare for jobs related to the design of digital telecommunications networks This is the second semester for the course to run.
